name: MiniStealth Demo
description:
the DEMO is finally here!

miniStealth is a fast-paced stealth action platformer where you use a grappling hook to avoid being seen by enemies.

You have a job to do, you must eliminate your target and everything that stands in your way.

 Make your way through 10 levels full of enemies

Move fast with your grappling hook

Minimalist pixel art

You can follow the development of all of my games in my twitter @GamesSudo and if you find any bug or have any suggestion let me know, feedback is very welcome.
